Products.description: Premium quality streetwear designed in Aix-en-Provence. Features a relaxed fit, heavy-weight cotton fabric, and our signature Kyo styling. Perfect for night outs or casual wear.

Legal.privacyIntro: At Kyo Wear, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.
Legal.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or sign up for our newsletter.
Legal.cookiesText: We use cookies to improve our website functionality and analyze traffic. You can control cookie settings through your browser.
Legal.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@kyowear.com.
